name: Basic Italian Bean Soup
author: Dawn Wensdofer Brower
summary: Simple and basic Italian bean soup. Great for a quick fix during the week. My Italian mother-in-law rattled this one out to me over the phone years ago. So glad I wrote it down quick! She doesn't remember telling me. The kids love it for a simple and quick dinner.
ingredients: 2 cloves garlic, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Heat olive oil in a pot over medium-high heat
Cook and stir onion in hot oil until tender, about 5 minutes; add garlic and continue cooking until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes more
Pour tomato sauce into the pot; stir
Add cannelini beans, basil, oregano, salt, and pepper
Bring the mixture to a simmer, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook until the beans are hot, 5 to 7 minutes more
